description: Apples, pears, and similar pome fruits
Raisins, dates, dried apricots, prunes (without added sugar)
Red, yellow, orange, and green bell peppers
Fresh tomatoes, cherry tomatoes, roma tomatoes
Button, shiitake, portobello, other edible mushrooms
Brown rice, wild rice, black rice
Whole wheat bread, pasta, flour products
Red, green, brown, or black lentils
Red kidney beans, white kidney beans
